title: Send Matomo analytics data to A.I. to analyze then save results in Baserow
author: Keith Rumjahn
readme:
# Who's this for?

  * If you own a website and need to analyze your Matomo analytics data so you can increse the number of frequent visitors
  * If you need to create an SEO report on what are the common trends amongst your most frequent visitors
  * If you want to grow your site based on suggestions from data



Matomo is an analytics tool that can give you details of each individual visitor. Much more powerful than Google analytics.

[Watch youtube tutorial here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=myG_tR2kBqo)

[Get my SEO A.I. agent system here](https://2828633406999.gumroad.com/l/rumjahn)

**[Read more -> How to create an A.I. Agent to analyze Matomo analytics using n8n for free](https://rumjahn.com/how-to-create-an-a-i-agent-to-analyze-matomo-analytics-using-n8n-for-free/)**

![Screenshot 20241121 at 4.17.51 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_11_21_at_4_17_51_PM_24bc93cab6.png)

Here's the A.I. output:  
![Screenshot 20241121 at 4.26.07 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_11_21_at_4_26_07_PM_c9987c2330.png)
    
    
    Keywords showing the most improvement:
    Openrouter N8N.
    
    Keywords needing attention:
    Ai Generated Reference Letter
    
    Obsidian Second Brain
    
    Suggested actions for improvement: 
    1. Optimize for "best Docker Synology" despite stable ranking, an improvement to top 10 is an achievable goal.
    
    2. Since "2nd brain app for developer"  is of interest to a developer. Consider writing a blog post on how the app addresses the specific pain points of developers.
    
    

# Use case

Instead of hiring an SEO expert, I run this report weekly. It looks at the data for the past week and looks for visitors with more than 3 visits and recommends ideas to convert more visitors into frequent visitors.

# How it works

  1. The workflow gathers matomo analytics for the past 7 days.
  2. We then parse the data
  3. The data is sent to Openrouter and using a FREE LLM, it analyses the data.
  4. It stores the results in baserow



# How to use this

  * Input your Matomo analytics credentials
  * Input your Matomo site ID
  * Input your [Openrouter.ai](http://Openrouter.ai) credentials
  * Input your baserow credentials
  * You will need to create a baserow database with columns: Dates, Notes, Blog.



Created by [Rumjahn](Rumjahn)

Obsidian Second Brain

Suggested actions for improvement: 
1. Optimize for "best Docker Synology" despite stable ranking, an improvement to top 10 is an achievable goal.

2. Since "2nd brain app for developer"  is of interest to a developer. Consider writing a blog post on how the app addresses the specific pain points of developers.

Use case

Instead of hiring an SEO expert, I run this report weekly. It looks at the data for the past week and looks for visitors with more than 3 visits and recommends ideas to convert more visitors into frequent visitors.

How it works

  1. The workflow gathers matomo analytics for the past 7 days.
  2. We then parse the data
  3. The data is sent to Openrouter and using a FREE LLM, it analyses the data.
  4. It stores the results in baserow

How to use this

  • Input your Matomo analytics credentials
  • Input your Matomo site ID
  • Input your Openrouter.ai credentials
  • Input your baserow credentials
  • You will need to create a baserow database with columns: Dates, Notes, Blog.

readme_zh:
# 适合谁使用？

* 如果您拥有网站并需要分析Matomo统计数据，以提升常客访问量  
* 如果您需要生成SEO报告，了解高频访客的共性特征  
* 如果您希望基于数据建议实现网站增长  

Matomo是一款能提供每位访客详细数据的分析工具，比Google Analytics更强大。

[观看YouTube教程](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=myG_tR2kBqo)  
[获取我的SEO人工智能代理系统](https://2828633406999.gumroad.com/l/rumjahn)  

**[继续阅读 -> 如何免费使用n8n创建AI代理分析Matomo数据](https://rumjahn.com/how-to-create-an-a-i-agent-to-analyze-matomo-analytics-using-n8n-for-free/)**  

![分析截图](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_11_21_at_4_17_51_PM_24bc93cab6.png)  

AI分析结果：  
![结果截图](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_11_21_at_4_26_07_PM_c9987c2330.png)  

**显著提升的关键词**：  
Openrouter N8N  

**需关注的关键词**：  
AI生成推荐信  
Obsidian第二大脑  

**优化建议**：  
1. 针对"best Docker Synology"进行优化，虽然排名稳定，但进入前十是可实现目标  
2. 鉴于"开发者专用第二大脑应用"受关注，可撰写博客说明该应用如何解决开发者痛点  

# 应用场景  
我每周自动生成此报告替代雇佣SEO专家，通过分析近7天访问3次以上的访客数据，提供增加常客转化率的方案。  

# 工作原理  
1. 采集近7天Matomo数据  
2. 解析数据  
3. 通过Openrouter调用免费大模型分析  
4. 将结果存储至Baserow  

# 使用方法  
* 配置Matomo账号凭证  
* 输入Matomo站点ID  
* 设置[Openrouter.ai](http://Openrouter.ai)凭证  
* 配置Baserow凭证  
* 需创建含Dates/Notes/Blog字段的Baserow数据库  

创建者：[Rumjahn](Rumjahn)
title_zh: 将Matomo分析数据发送至人工智能进行分析，然后将结果保存到Baserow
